body:
SELECT VD.SHIFT, VD.PWORKSTATIONID, VD.PWORKSTATIONNO, VD.PID, VD.PQUANTITY, VD.PQ, VD.WORKTOTAL,
    dbo.GET_HMCLOCK(VD.WORKTOTAL) WORKTOTAL_FORMATLI, dbo.GET_HMCLOCK(VD.NONSTOPSPLANNEDTIME),VD.NONSTOPSPLANNEDTIME,  VD.STOPSPLANNEDTIME, VD.COKOTEDURATION, b.CYCLEPERIOD, *
FROM VE_DCASOEETEEP VD
     LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT B.COMPANYID, B.PID, B.QUANTITY, B.QUANTITY2, B.QUANTITY3, B.CYCLEUNIT, B.PPROCESSID,
                         B.SPEED, B.CAPACITY, B.CYCLEPERIOD, B.CYCLEOFCOE, B.CYCLEOFPULSE
                     FROM PPRODUCTPLANWS B) B ON VD.COMPANYID=B.COMPANYID AND VD.PID=B.PID
     LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT C.COMPANYID, C.PID, C.PWORKSTATIONID, C.CYCLEPERIOD, C.CAPACITY, C.CYCLEOFCOE,
                         C.CYCLEOFPULSE
                     FROM PPROPLANWSCYCLE C) C ON C.COMPANYID=VD.COMPANYID AND C.PID=VD.PID
                                                  AND C.PWORKSTATIONID=VD.PWORKSTATIONID
WHERE VD.PWORKSTATIONID=28 AND VD.TRANSDATE BETWEEN '2024-05-02 00:00:00' AND '2024-05-02 00:00:00' AND VD.SHIFT=2
ORDER BY VD.WORKTOTAL DESC, VD.SHIFT, VD.TRANSDATE DESC
GO
